entry: Comuinidade dos Paises de Lingua Portuguesa (CPLP)
description: 1996 to establish a forum for friendship among Portuguese-speaking nations where Portuguese is an official language members - (9) Angola, Brazil, Cabo Verde, Equatorial Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Mozambique, Portugal, Sao Tome and Principe, Timor-Leste associate observers - (10) Czechia, Georgia, Hungary, Japan, Mauritius, Namibia, Senegal, Slovakia, Turkey, Uruguay
